title: Billionaire calls Apple ‘ungodly well-managed’ because ‘zillions of friends’ would trade an arm for an iPhone
content:
According to Vice-Chairman of Berkshire Hathaway Charlie Munger, the maker of the iPhone is “ungodly well-managed.” As Apple (AAPL) is now Berkshire Hathaway’s largest stock holding, Munger is continually impressed by its performance.

description: Billionaire Charlie Munger exclaims Apple is “ungodly well-managed” after it becomes Berkshire Hathaway's largest stock holding.
